item.g:title: Clay Coffee cups - Pack of 2 | Earthenware Coffee mug
item.g:description:
Enjoy your cup of tea/coffee/Milk with the benefit of a beautiful looking clay cup. It not only adds beauty but also the abundance of health benefits that nourishes and boosts your mood instantly. This unglazed and chemical-free earthen clay cup enhances the taste of your beverages with its natural earthy flavour.
Our products are made of pure natural clay and are unglazed. Reusable and washable. No chemical, No artificial colors. Bio-degradable Eco-friendly
Cleaning instructions:
For the first use, soak the product in water for 24hrs. For regular usage, clean with hot water & brush. No chemical washing products are required. Use rock salt and scrub pad & soak in hot water for half an hour, to clean stubborn stains. Make use of baking soda to remove absorbed odours of garlic, onion etc
item.g:product_type: HOME > EARTHEN CLAY COOKWARES > Clay Coffee cups - Pack of 2 | Earthenware Coffee mug

item.g:title: Clay cup and saucer - Pack of 2
item.g:description:
Start your day with a fresh and earthy cup of Tea/Coffee/Milk. Our earthen cup and saucer add special earthy and heavenly flavour to your beverages. The earthen cup enhances the natural flavours of the drink and makes it pleasant. Using these clay cup and saucer provides you with a feeling of connection with mother earth.
Our products are made of pure natural clay and are unglazed. Reusable and washable. No chemical, No artificial colors. Bio-degradable Eco-friendly
Cleaning instructions
Before using for the first time, the product needs to be cleaned. It needs to be soaked completely in water for 24 hours. After the first use, it can be cleaned using water and scrub. No detergent or soap is needed since the product is porous, it may absorb the soap.
item.g:product_type: HOME > EARTHEN CLAY COOKWARES > Clay cup and saucer - Pack of 2

item.g:title: Kichili Samba Rice - Organic Par Boiled Rice
item.g:description: Known for its easy digestive ability, Kichili Samba has a unique flavor. Kichili Samba Rice boosts immune system, strengthens muscles and makes skin look shiny. Good for diabetic patients. It can be used to prepare Briyani, Sweet Kozhukattai and other rice recipes.
item.g:product_type: HOME > Rice > Kichili Samba Rice - Organic Par Boiled Rice

item.g:title: Seeraga Samba Organic Raw Rice | Biryani Rice | Jeeraga Samba
item.g:description: Seeraga Samba/ Jeeraga Samba is popularly known as Biryani rice as it is most commonly used in South Indian Biryani varieties. Since it resembles like Seeragam (cumin), hence the name Seeraga samba. It contains ample phytonutrients in it. It helps to fight cancer, reduces cholesterol, keeps heart attack at bay and cures constipation. It is a low-GI food that helps keep blood sugar levels in control and is good for diabetic patients. It can be consumed as plain rice with sambar, curries and also as tasty aromatic Briyani.
item.g:product_type: HOME > Rice > Seeraga Samba Organic Raw Rice | Biryani Rice | Jeeraga Samba

item.g:title: Red Rice / Sivappu Kavuni Organic Unpolished Raw Rice
item.g:description: Red rice is a gift of diabetes patients, cures anemia, prevents asthma, skin ageing, cures bone related problems, prevents obesity, controls bad cholesterol, heart attack and many other health benefits. The color red is due to the presence of Anthocyanin in it. Hence red rice has enormous anti-oxidants in it. You can replace some quantity if idly rice with red rice to get delicious and healthy idly/dosa/appam batter. It can also be used to make Khichadi.
item.g:product_type: HOME > Rice > Red Rice / Sivappu Kavuni Organic Unpolished Raw Rice

item.g:title: Black Rice - Forbidden Rice - Karuppu Kavuni - Organic Raw Rice
item.g:description:
Karuppu Kavuni Rice (Raw) Commonly called by the name Emperor’s rice, black rice was believed to be consumed by ancient Chinese. This forbidden rice contains more phytonutrients in it. It is highly rich in fiber, antioxidants and acts as a perfect detoxifier for liver, prevents diabetes, cancer Many recipes are made using Black rice. Most popular among them is Dosa, puttu, Pudding with Coconut & Mango, Risotto, plain rice with various curries and others.
Pack Variations: 1/2kg - ₹134, 1kg - ₹236, 2kg - ₹469, 5kg - ₹5723
item.g:product_type: HOME > Rice > Black Rice - Forbidden Rice - Karuppu Kavuni - Organic Raw Rice

item.g:title: Poongar Rice - ParBoiled - Hand Pounded -Organic Rice
item.g:description:
Exclusive Rice for Women.
Poongar Rice, is one of the traditional rice, it is slightly reddish in color and resembles Mappilai Samba Rice. It is hand pounded and has more minerals than other type of rice. Poongar Rice helps to recover from celiac disease, cures diabetes, reduces cholesterol, increases the hemoglobin content in the blood and boosts the immune system. Regular intake of Poongar Rice by pregnant women, leads to normal vaginal delivery. This rice is ideal to make Soft Idlies apart from preparing Dosa and other rice preparations.
item.g:product_type: HOME > Rice > Poongar Rice - ParBoiled - Hand Pounded -Organic Rice

item.g:title: Bamboo Rice - Organic Rice - Mulayari - Unpolished Rice
item.g:description: Bamboo Rice is one of most popular varieties of rice, grown in India Forest. It is the seed that is produced by a flowering bamboo at the end of its life span. Bamboo rice is rich in various nutrients and minerals including carbohydrates, fibre and protein. Bamboo rice has properties that enhances fertility. Bamboo rice tastes like wheat but has a low glycemic index which best suits for diabetic patients. Bamboo rice is a medicinal rice used in Ayurveda, used to treat many types of diseases. Bamboo rice removes toxins from body and keeps body fit and healthy. Bamboo Rice can be used to make Biryani, Bamboo Rice Puttu, Payasam and Bamboo Rice Dosa.
item.g:product_type: HOME > Rice > Bamboo Rice - Organic Rice - Mulayari - Unpolished Rice

item.g:title: Ponni Boiled - Organic Par Boiled Rice
item.g:description: Ponni literally means Gold in Tamil and also refers to River Kaveri. Parboiled rice is a better source of fiber, calcium, potassium and vitamin B-6 than regular white rice. Ponni boiled rice improves heart health , blood circulation and is good for diabetic patients as it has low glycemic index

item.g:title: PLANTABLE GANESHA IDOL KIT| ECO-FRIENDLY SEED VINAYAKA
item.g:description:
Celebrate this year's Ganesh Chathurthi with eco-friendly plantable seed Ganesha. Get the blessing of Lord Vinayaga by planting his idol for Visarjan.
Note: Please Pre-book to get your order delivered at the right time.
All you have to do is, just place the idol inside the cow dung pot along with cocopeat and spray little water for a few days. You will feel auspicious looking at the little spinach seeds sprouting into a lush green carpet of spinach plant. Voila! You can use these spinach plants for your special palak paneer recipe, with a delighted smile on your face.
This pack contains Eco-friendly clay Ganesh Murti embedded with spinach seeds (6 x 3 inches)+ Cow dung Pot (5.5 x 5.5 inches) + Cocopeat. Enjoy the guilt-free Visarjan and let all your wishes come true this year through the blessing of Lord Ganesha.
Do your little part to our mother earth and save our oceans from pollution, by ordering online this eco-friendly Vinayaga Murthi.
item.g:product_type: HOME > EARTHEN CLAY COOKWARES > PLANTABLE GANESHA IDOL KIT| ECO-FRIENDLY SEED VINAYAKA

item.g:title: Buy 2 - loofah body scrubber
item.g:description: Loofahs are natural, organic and eco-friendly body scrubs that help you to cleanse and exfoliate your skin in a gentle way. Loofahs are commonly used due to its various health benefits related to glowing skin. It is made out of ridge gourds. Ridge gourds attain a sponge-like scrub texture when it is completely ripe and dried. Unlike plastic body scrubs and sponges, loofah is completely plant-based and bio-degradable. Pamper yourself with guilt-free natural scrub along with 100% natural homemade soaps.
item.g:product_type: HOME > PERSONAL CARE > Buy 2 - loofah body scrubber

item.g:title: SESAME OIL | GINGELLY OIL | COLDPRESSED
item.g:description: Sesame seeds may be tiny, but the oil extracted from it has huge health benefits. It is full of protein (contains 4.7gms of protein per ounce) which comes to nearly 20% of the seed. It is highly rich in unsaturated fats, and got enough anti-oxidants. It lowers Blood pressure, treats Arthritis, good for skin, hair and oral health. Good for digestion, protects liver from alcohol’s impact and much more. It is used to prepare Sesame chicken, Asian sesame chicken salad, Ell urundai, pulao, sesame apple salad and much more.
item.g:product_type: HOME > OIL > SESAME OIL | GINGELLY OIL | COLDPRESSED

item.g:title: Groundnut Oil | Peanut Oil | Wood-pressed oil
item.g:description: Groundnut Oil is typically yellow in color and is a good source of fats and contains anti-oxidants, which helps to boost immune system and helps in reducing bad cholesterol. It helps in curing heart issues, skin issues and boosts immune system. A good source of high energy, when consumed continuously keeps you young with glittering skin. It can be used to prepare chutney, samosa, different curry items and much more.
item.g:product_type: HOME > OIL > Groundnut Oil | Peanut Oil | Wood-pressed oil

item.g:title: WOOD COLD PRESSED COCONUT OIL
item.g:description: Known for its anti-bacterial, anti-viral activities, coconut oil is full of anti-oxidants and got MCFA. It differs from normal coconut oil in terms of extraction, refining appearance, composition and health benefits. It helps in boosting immune system, treats skin, hair related problems. Since it has got Lauric acid in it, coconut oil cures problems in various parts of human body like liver, kidney and pancreas. It also reduces cholesterol and has got vital nutrients.
item.g:product_type: HOME > OIL > WOOD COLD PRESSED COCONUT OIL

item.g:title: HILL HONEY
item.g:description: Honey is considered a god food right from the ancient time. It is highly recommended to all ages as it comprises of antiseptic, antifungal, antibacterial and antiviral properties. It treats skin issues, cold, cough and prevents bad cholesterol. It also helps in boosting immune systems and enhances energy level of your body.
item.g:product_type: HOME > HONEY > HILL HONEY

item.g:title: TULSI HONEY
item.g:description: It is mostly extracted from the flowers of Van Tulsi (Vana Thulasi in Tamil). It has a pleasant aroma and extremely tasty. It contains vitamins like A, B-complex, C, D, E, K and a large composition of minerals. It also consists of numerous live enzymes that are required to give you long life health benefits. These health benefits will not be found in any super food these days. Having Tulsi honey on the dining table increases immune system and prevents us from cough, cold and fights other diseases.
item.g:product_type: HOME > HONEY > TULSI HONEY

item.g:title: NEEM HONEY
item.g:description: It is also known by the name Dark Honey and Veppilai Then in Tamil. Indigenous to Tamil Nadu and Malaysia, which are the two major places where wild raw honey is extracted, Neem Honey is considered as a gift/remedy, as it has got almost all medicinal value in it. It’s got a distinctive gingerbread taste and flavors like exotic spices. Once you experience the wild sweetness of this honey, you’ll never go back to the farmed honey. It is an effective and proven cure for acne and all types of skin issues. It helps in treating various respiratory problems like asthma and bronchitis.
item.g:product_type: HOME > HONEY > NEEM HONEY

item.g:title: NAVAL HONEY
item.g:description: It is considered as God’s food and hence given the common name elixir. It is capable of fighting illness and acts as an anti-ageing tonic. It has numerous health benefits and mainly helps in controlling and preventing diabetes. It helps in decreasing the level of sugar in urine.
item.g:product_type: HOME > HONEY > NAVAL HONEY

item.g:title: MURINGO HONEY
item.g:description: Native of South India, Muringo honey is Dark brown in color. The bees collect the honey from Murungai poo (Drumstick Flower) of Murungai maram which are found in almost all the houses of South India, especially Tamil Nadu. Since Murungai Poo has got the right potential for curing impotency in men, consuming its honey will evidently increase sperm count and increases fertility.
item.g:product_type: HOME > HONEY > MURINGO HONEY

item.g:title: Little Millet - Organic Samai
item.g:description: Little Millet is mostly consumed as replacement of rice. Any recipe that demands staple rice can be prepared using little millet. It has the smallest grains, so it cooks faster than other millets. Little millet is suitable for people of all age groups. The flavonoids present in the little millet act as antioxidants and play many roles in the body’s immune defense system. Consuming Little Millet regularly , reduces the risk of breast cancer and asthma.
item.g:product_type: HOME > MILLETS > Little Millet - Organic Samai

item.g:title: Foxtail Millet - Organic Thinai - Kangni
item.g:description: Foxtail Millet is rich in vitamins and minerals. This little grain has low glycemic value which best suits for diabetic patients and to all age groups. Millets are mentioned as a treasured crops in the Bible. Easily digestible and provides serotonin which keeps us in happy mood.
item.g:product_type: HOME > MILLETS > Foxtail Millet - Organic Thinai - Kangni

item.g:title: Organic Pearl Millet | Rye | Kambu
item.g:description: Pearl Millet is rich in essential compounds like protein, fibre, phosphorous, magnesium and iron. Due to its rich composition of minerals and proteins, Pearl Millet has many health benefits. Regular intake of millets provides protection against breast cancer in pre-menopausal women. Split Black Urad Dal is especially good for women since it contains folic acid and is a good source of iron as well. It can be used to make dishes like Urad Dal curry, Maa ki dal, Shahi Urad dal and Dal Makhani. . Black Urad dal can be used as a replacement to White Urad dal as the skin provides additional fiber and nutrition.

item.g:title: ORGANIC A2 COW GHEE
item.g:description: Ulamart Cow Ghee is obtained using traditional methods from the oldest native Kanchipuram Kuttai cows. These cows are indigenous to Tamilnadu which graze in the natural organic environment. Kanchikuttai cow produces healthier A2 milk which has abundant nutritional value. We do not process our Ghee / Clarified butter from the cream of milk. Instead, we use our age-old method of curdling the milk and churning it slowly in a bi-directional way, to separate the buttermilk and butter. This pure butter is heated on a low flame to produce 100% pure Ghee. Ghee prepared using this method has the perfect aroma, texture, colour and flavour. And it also retains the maximum nutrition. Burst the myth about Ghee: There has always been a myth that Ghee makes you fat, induces cholesterol and high blood pressure. The answer is No. Ghee is the purest form of consumable animal fat which is in fact much better than refined vegetable oil. Ghee increases the good fat in your body which is much required to lead a healthy energetic life. It aids in reducing LDL and triglycerides (bad cholesterol). Experience the taste of 100% pure Ghee. Free from unhealthy additives, preservatives and trans fats
item.g:product_type: HOME > OIL > ORGANIC A2 COW GHEE

Palm Jaggery is free from chemicals and bleach which makes it a good alternative to chemically processed white sugar. Palm sugar or palm jaggery is rich in dietary fibre which helps with digestion and improves bowel movements. It is filled with many nutrients like magnesium, calcium and potassium. Earlier introduction of palm Jaggery to your diet will help in the prevention of diabetes by balancing blood sugar levels because it has a low glycemic index. Instruction: Dissolve the required amount of Jaggery in little water and sieve it using a tea filter. Use this dissolved liquid in your dishes.

Natural Reusable Chemical-free. Eco-friendly

item.g:title: Karuppu Kavuni Par Boiled Rice (Black Rice Par Boiled) - 100% Organic
item.g:description: Karuppu Kavuni Rice (Par Boiled) Commonly called by the name Emperor’s rice, black rice was believed to be consumed by ancient Chinese. This forbidden rice contains more phytonutrients in it. It is highly rich in fiber, antioxidants and acts as a perfect detoxifier for liver, prevents diabetes, cancer Many recipes are made using Black rice. Most popular among them is Dosa, puttu, Pudding with Coconut & Mango, Risotto, plain rice with various curries and others.

item.g:title: Ragi Millet Flakes | Ragi aval| Finger millet Flakes | Poha
item.g:description: Ragi millet flakes are nothing but flattened ragi millets. Along with the benefits of Ragi, you also get the added benefit of probiotics through this poha. Give a healthier twist to your breakfast or dinner with Ragi Millet flakes. Ragi millet flakes are a hassle-free alternative to the packaged instant corn flakes or muesli available in the market. This gluten free, diabetic-friendly Ragi Flakes is rich in iron, a good source of calcium along with healthy protein and fiber which makes it a quick and perfect choice to fit into your quick morning routine. Ulamart’s Ragi poha are carefully manufactured following strict hygiene protocols and organic sourcing. Free from refined sugar and preservatives. Ragi flakes is the right superfood to start your day super recharged.
item.g:product_type: HOME > FRYUMS & FLAKES > Ragi Millet Flakes | Ragi aval| Finger millet Flakes | Poha

item.g:title: Vallarai-Brahmi Idly Dosai powder
item.g:description:
With the goodness of Vallarai, this Idly-dosa podi is made with handpicked healthy ingredients. Vallarai is a medicinal plant with numerous health benefits. This powder is also known as Podi(in Tamil) which consists of ground dried Vallarai along with perfect blend of pulses/dal. Made with pure natural ingredients it is the best daily alternative to have with your Idly-dosa. This unique Idly-dosa podi is sure to treat your taste buds and health too. This Brahmi powder can also be sprinkled on your subzi/ side dish to add extra taste and health to it. It is free from
Preservatives Artificial ingredients Chemicals Flavour enhancers Artificial Color

item.g:title: SHIKAKAI POWDER - HERBAL HAIR WASH PRODUCT
item.g:description:
This herbal hair wash powder is a perfect blend of more than 14 different herbs which helps in cleaning your hair naturally and also nourishes & conditions your hair.
If you are looking for a natural way to clean your hair, this homemade-handmade herbal hair wash shikakai powder is the best choice. As it not only cleans your hair but also gives your hair a perfect natural shine.
Ingredients:
Tulsi leaves : It helps in rejuvenation of hair follicles and strengthens the root of your hair. Helps in regrowth of new hair and reduces hair fall. Shikakai : It is a natural hair cleanser and hair scrub, which acts as a cooling agent and soothes the dry & itchy scalp problems. Soap nut | Reetha : These nuts are useful in producing a mild and natural foam to this hair wash powder and it also helps in providing a shiny, lustrous and healthy hair. Amla | Nellikai | Indian gooseberry : Amla serves as a miracle cure for all types of hair problems. Strengthens hair follicles and improves the thickness of hair. Fenugreek | Vendhayam : Well known for its antifungal & anti-inflammatory properties. Induces hair growth and helps in reducing dandruff/dry and itchy scalp. Acts as a coolant. It is rich in iron and much needed protein for your hair growth. Hibiscus flower & leaf | Sembaruthi: Rich in antioxidants, vitamin C. The amino acids present in Hibiscus acts as a natural conditioner and leaves your hair soft and shiny. It is also widely used for reducing alopecia. Avarampoo : This golden yellow flower is best known for its antibacterial & anti-inflammatory properties, which treats scalp infection & inflammation. It also acts as a coolant. Vetiver : It has an antiseptic along with a natural earthy fragrance that rejuvenates your mood and hair. Rose petals : It fortifies your hair follicles and helps in the growth of thick and sturdy hair. It helps in cleansing & moisturising your hair and reduces dandruff. Its antioxidant and antimicrobial properties aid in reducing many types of hair infections. Neem : This special leaf has innumerable medicinal properties along with its antibacterial, antifungal and anti-inflammatory properties which treats dandruff, strengthens hair follicles and promotes hair growth. Curry leaves : It is an age-old leaf that plays an important role in hair growth, reduces early greying of hair and keeps your hair shiny and thick. Bhringraj : This medicinal herb aids in improving the health of your scalp and hair follicles, prevents early greying of hair, cures dry , itchy scalp and reduces dandruff. Karboga arisi | bakuchi | Babchi : It helps in reducing hair fall, alopecia. It has antifungal, anthelmintic, aromatic and antibacterial properties which is used in curing skin / scalp and hair issues.
item.g:product_type: HOME > HERBAL PRODUCTS > SHIKAKAI POWDER - HERBAL HAIR WASH PRODUCT
